<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Diehard](/Feats.aspx?ID=774) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 260 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

It takes more to kill you than most. You die from the dying condition at dying 5, rather than dying 4.

<title level="2">Diehard leads to...</title>
[Numb to Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=1182)
name: Diehard
